items.text: #AI is playing a transformative role in #retail by enabling the retailers to leverage the potential of #emergingtech to bring supply chain efficiency, influence customers’ decisions, promote customised products, showcase products virtually & boost sales. https://t.co/MvdifZKC8M
Walmart to sell at-home COVID-19 test kits https://t.co/ytpebXuW9t

Remote areas are at risk to supply chain disruptions and high energy costs that could leave them without power if a shipment is missed.
A microreactor eliminates this risk by providing fuel security and clean power around-the-clock for years to come without interruption. https://t.co/IasdHUb4Xp

Well done @Emirates on performing the first Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF)-partially powered #A380 delivery flight! ⛽️ 
An important milestone for the sector's supply chain that continues to ensure the widespread availability of SAF. https://t.co/1er5HAN8Fb

.@kavitapmd: We can use existing supply chain companies... so that we can understand how to get vaccines to difficult communities, rural, tribal nations, territories, so many. I think that is exactly what the incoming administration is planning to do. #AMJoy https://t.co/fLMqD8p9u9
Hackers are targeting the COVID-19 vaccine supply chain, IBM finds https://t.co/feHbHfrccd https://t.co/gCyz4QT5uR
Hackers threaten to disrupt COVID-19 vaccine supply chain https://t.co/C6zRi83fDQ https://t.co/cSedFlm1DX
Defence chiefs are in talks about a move to take over one of Britain's oldest steelmakers in an attempt to shore up the supply chain of Britain's nuclear submarine fleet https://t.co/0PKAOjVaz7
WSJ reporting that Pfizer now expects it can only ship *half* of the Covid-19 vaccines it had planned this year because of supply chain problems. Says it can still hit a billion doses in 2021.

BREAKING— Pfizer is slashing its expected delivery of vaccine doses from 100 million to 50 million because of production quality issues. Everyone needs 2 doses. So this is a big hit. #COVID19 https://t.co/VfJXorRAWA

Richard Wilding, professor of supply chain strategy: "There are about 80 different elements that need to be in place" before people can receive their Covid vaccination, and the mass scale rollout needs to be "like a well choreographed ballet."

@JuliaHB1 | @SupplyChainProf https://t.co/xwfswBHzTn

Very nice. You guys have some partyyyy meanwhile Moradabad farmers are unable to access Delhi market and the supply chain issues has caused veggie prices to fall and consequently big losses to those farmers.

So what's the issue. Isn't it? 🤡 https://t.co/JiLNPfuofE

The Department of Homeland Security issues a warning that hackers are targeting key actors in the coronavirus vaccine supply chain and points to IBM's findings of malicious activity https://t.co/jeMGbdwSvB

WSJ: Pfizer now expects to ship half the doses it had originally planned, from 100 million doses down to 50 million, after finding raw materials in early production didn’t meet its standards.
https://t.co/82Malmr24u

Winter 2020-21 could see severe flooding, civil unrest, Covid spikes, influenza, supply chain failures and a national mental health crisis according to the govt's own briefing. What minister in their right mind would add no-deal pandemonium to that list? 
https://t.co/75Tpfu0O17

1/3 of all food produced globally is lost or wasted every year.

Amid supply chain challenges due to #COVID19, @UNDP explains how cities can prevent food loss & achieve #ZeroHunger through #ClimateAction solutions.

https://t.co/k56liv5XVd

It would be cheaper to give people cash to buy food than giving people food itself. Pay the supply-chain to work.

#WeOweUS #UBI
